name: Planetary Pew Force
description:
Blast your way through endless waves of alien invaders in this free 2-bitish pixel art shoot'em  up! 

Controls

Arrow keys - Move

Spacebar - Shoot

Esc - Pause menu

Setup

Play in the browser window if your computer can handle it!

Download an .exe if you want! pick from fullscreen or smaller size windowed versions!

Get the android version for mobile gamers here! (coming soon)
